body_html: the bug still exists in tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(variables_collections=['vars'], outputs_collections='vars2'). If you do just variables_collections='vars' it will return an empty list. Annoying if you do not know this thread.
body_text: the bug still exists in tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(variables_collections=['vars'], outputs_collections='vars2'). If you do just variables_collections='vars' it will return an empty list. Annoying if you do not know this thread.
body: the bug still exists in` tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(variables_collections=['vars'], outputs_collections='vars2')`. If you do just` variables_collections='vars'` it will return an empty list. Annoying if you do not know this thread.
